pr_title: Add CNA Gene Filter to StudyViewFilter

timeline.message:
Add CNA Gene Filter to StudyViewFilter

- Created CNAFilter type
- Added CNAFilters to StudyViewFilter
- Created CNAFilterApplier
- Added CNAFilterApplier to StudyViewFilterApplier
- Relevant tests

timeline.bodyText: Studies can have multiple CNA profiles (ex: gbm_tcga_pub study has 2 CNA profiles). profileType needs to be included. It looks much similar to GenomicDataFilter, may be reuse it
timeline.author: kalletlak

timeline.message:
GeneFilter and StudyViewSampleFilter support all CNA muts

- Changed the regex in GeneFilter to accept `GAIN|DIPLOID|HETLOSS`
- Modified `getDiscreteCopyNumbersInMultipleMolecularProfiles` in
  DiscreteCopyNumberServiceImpl to support all CNA mutations
  - This method is called by StudyViewFilterApplier, so this allows the
  filter applier to support al CNA muts

timeline.bodyText: I think this is not required
timeline.author: kalletlak

timeline.message:
Treatments API Tweaks
- Add new endpoint for determining if sample treatments should be displayed.
  This needed to be separated because for `gbm_columbia_2019`, sample treatments
  should not be displayed, but patient treatments should.
- Filter out unknown treatments from sample treatments API
- Switch from using internal ID to stable ID for the patient field

GeneFilter and StudyViewSampleFilter support all CNA muts

- Changed the regex in GeneFilter to accept `GAIN|DIPLOID|HETLOSS`
- Modified `getDiscreteCopyNumbersInMultipleMolecularProfiles` in
  DiscreteCopyNumberServiceImpl to support all CNA mutations
  - This method is called by StudyViewFilterApplier, so this allows the
  filter applier to support al CNA muts

GeneFilter and StudyViewSampleFilter support all CNA muts

- Changed the regex in GeneFilter to accept `GAIN|DIPLOID|HETLOSS`
- Modified `getDiscreteCopyNumbersInMultipleMolecularProfiles` in
  DiscreteCopyNumberServiceImpl to support all CNA mutations
  - This method is called by StudyViewFilterApplier, so this allows the
  filter applier to support al CNA muts
